description: Dan noticed this while looking at the code: we never actually delete the ovs ports that we create.
title: LinuxOVSInterfaceDriver never deletes the OVS ports it creates

comments.content: Dan noticed this while looking at the code: we never actually delete the ovs ports that we create.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bgh

i can see del-port in

So closing this bug
